thread.title: UK police call incident involving ex-Russian spy 'shocking'

title: UK police call incident involving ex-Russian spy 'shocking'
text:
UK police call incident involving ex-Russian spy 'shocking' 9:48pm IST - 01:00 
Local police have said the incident involving a former Russian double agent who fell ill after exposure to an unknown substance is ''shocking''. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Local police have said the incident involving a former Russian double agent who fell ill after exposure to an unknown substance is "shocking". Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2oTL3Cc
